institution: University of Vermont & State Agricultural College
award_title: ERI: Towards Dynamic Life Cycle Assessment of Renewable Energy Hub Systems
subject: Co-simulation setups that only run on your machine
body:
Getting Brightway and Modelica to talk to each other is hard enough. Getting that setup to work for anyone else? Nightmare.

I'm a computational materials scientist who built Ouro because I kept hitting the same wallâ€”my coupling frameworks and workflows didn't outlive the paper. It's a tool for sharing computational work in a way that's actually reproducible, not just a zip file with a prayer.

Happy to show you a quick demo after the holidays if you're interested.

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
